resources.string: Import config success, please restart the machine\n\n[Note] This prompt box is generated because there is an import_CustomConfig folder in the U disk. If you do not need this prompt, please click "Restart later" After that, move the file management -> USB / delete the import_CustomConfig folder.

Import config success, please restart the machine\n\n[Note] This prompt box is generated because there is a VsyncRes folder in the U disk. If you do not need this prompt, please click "Restart later" After that, move the file management->USB/ delete the VsyncRes folder.
The same config exists, no need to import
The import has been completed, please restart the machine, the following config file is missing
preparing to copy the upgrade file.
MCU version and system do not match, waiting for the MCU upgrade to complete.
voice does not start, please turn on the wake-up switch
voice is not activated, please connect to the network
\n\nTips! Because of KLD exists. This tips screen will be display. Deleting KLD will make it disappear!
Output fail! This device has been outputed at this Time! ->\n
